A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This \"movie\" is a 152 minutes long hate letter from Rian Johnson to the fans of the Star Wars franchise. I have never seen a movie so evidently aimed at outraging\, mocking\, disrespecting\, emotionally harming the fan base. And then the director has the courage to accuse the fan base to be too stupid to understand the movie. We got it\, dear fuckface. Your next hate letters will be welcomed by desert theaters. I hope this is the last movie you will be allowed to direct.
